question: Your Overseas friend has invited you to visit his country. You are planning to visit him.Write a letter to your friend, In your letter.•	Thank him for the invitation & accept the invitation.•	Write detail about your visit. •	Briefly describe what you want to do there.
text: How are you are your family?

Firstly, I was delighted when I saw your letter containing the invitation to visit your country. I am thankful to you for that. Moreover, I have been wanting to visit the UK for a long & my fortune. You have provided an opportunity to fulfil my desire.
I will arrive at the Heathrow airport on 10th June at 9.0 AM by British airways flight no. 3232. I will stay in the UK for 18 days & my return ticket is confirmed for 29 June.

I am pretty excited about the trip. I like to visit some attraction places like the Tower of London, the London eye museum & the Millenium dome. On top of everything, I would like to spend some time with you & share some lough with nostalgic memories.
Looking forward to having a great time with you in London.
